properties.description: Any initial article that should not be used for alphabetical arrangement or database searches.
properties.title: Non Sort

properties.description: The title of the resource.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Remainder of the title information after the title proper; a colon will be inserted automatically in the display.
properties.title: Subtitle

properties.description: The type of title.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Default field label is "Title".
properties.title: Display Label

properties.description: The source code of the vocabulary from which the name term was taken, e.g. 'naf' or 'viaf'.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Name of the person or entity associated with the creation of the resource.
properties.title: Name Part

properties.description: Textual role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary. Use "Creator" or "Contributor" as default.
properties.title: Role (text)

properties.description: Coded role term from MARCRelator terms vocabulary. Use "cre" or "ctb" as default (code for "Creator" and "Contributor", respectively).
properties.title: Role (code)

properties.description: Suggested value for field label is the same as the textual role term. Default value is Creator.
properties.title: Display Label

properties.description: Enter the place of publication as it appears on the resource. For a resource with no formal publication, optionally, enter the place the resource originated.
properties.title: Place of Publication

properties.description: The entity that published, printed, distributed, released, issued, or produced the resource.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description:
Date the resource was created.
Prefer for born-digital and unpublished or informally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version.
Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: Use for single dates
properties.title: Date Created

properties.description: Use with single dates that are approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of a date range.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of a date range.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of a date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description:
The date the object was issued.
Prefer for formally published materials. For reformatted material, use the date of the source, not the digital version.
Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Use for single dates
properties.title: Date Issued

properties.description: Use with single dates that are approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for start of a date range.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Use with start of date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for end of a date range.
properties.title: End Date

properties.description: Use with end of a date range that is approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Use for the date(s) on which the resource was digitized or a subsequent snapshot was taken, if different from Date Created or Date Issued.
properties.title: Date Captured

properties.description: Single date only. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Captured

properties.description: Use with single dates that are approximate, inferred, or questionable.
properties.title: Qualifier

properties.description: Topical focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Topical Subject

properties.description: Geographic focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Geographic Subject

properties.description: Time period focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Temporal Subject

properties.description: Genre focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Genre Subject

properties.description: Personal, corporate, or family name that is the focus of the content of the resource.
properties.title: Name Subject

properties.description: A summary, abstract, scope and content note, or other description.
Suggested values include "Description", "Summary", "Scope and Content".
properties.title: Display Label

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the content of the resource that do not fit in a more specific field.
properties.title: Note

properties.description:
Type of note, such as "content", "biographical/historical", "performers", "thesis", "date". Preferably selected from list of note types.
Enter general notes about the material as "content".
properties.title: Type of Note

properties.description: The default field label is "Note".
properties.title: Display Label

properties.description: Use the drop down menu to select an authorized MODS value characterizing the resource’s format.
properties.title: Type of Resource

properties.description:
The controlled vocabulary from which the genre term was taken.
Preferred vocabulary is LC Genre/Form Terms; use "lcgft".
Other vocabularies from Subject Heading and Term Source Codes are allowed.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Generic term for the format of the resource, e.g. “photographs”, “correspondence”, “paintings”, “theses”
properties.title: Genre

properties.description:
The controlled vocabulary from which the form term was taken.
Getty's Art & Architecture Thesaurus is preferred; use "aat".
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: A generic term for the form of the resource, e.g. "photographs", "correspondence"; "theses"
properties.title: Form

properties.description: A detailed note about the physical medium of the resource.
properties.title: Medium

properties.description: A statement of size or number and specific material of the units of the resource.
properties.title: Extent

properties.description:
The file type of the digital resource.
Use all lowercase letters without punctuation, eg, "jp2", "pdf", "mp3", "mp4".
properties.title: Internet Media Type

properties.description:
Enter the authority for the language term.
The alpha-3 codes from ISO 639-2 are preferred.
properties.title: Authority

properties.description: Information about the ownership and provenance of the resource.
properties.title: Ownership

properties.description: Use the drop down menu to select the controlled form of the name and URL of the LDC member repository providing the resource.

properties.title: Source

properties.description: Notes about ownership other than the name of the LDC repository providing the resource.
properties.title: Ownership Notes

properties.description: Suggested values include "Source Note", "Provenance", "Original Owner".
properties.title: Display Label

properties.description: Information pertaining to the full collection.
properties.title: Host Collection

properties.description: Information pertaining to the digital collection as a whole.
properties.title: Digital Collection

properties.description: The title of the digital collection.
properties.title: Digital Collection

properties.description: The URL of the digital collection landing page.
properties.title: Relation

properties.description: Information pertaining to the repository/physical collection.
properties.title: Repository Collection

properties.description: Title of the repository collection, if notably different from the digital collection.
properties.title: Repository Collection

properties.description: URL of the finding aid or repository collection guide.
properties.title: Repository Collection Guide

properties.description: Name of the institution or repository that holds the physical resource.
properties.title: Physical Location

properties.description: Home page of the institution or repository. This will be the hyperlinked URL for the Physical Location field.
properties.title: Institution Web Site

properties.description: OCLC Member Symbol of the institution or repository.
properties.title: OCLC Member Symbol

properties.description: A department, collection, or other sublocation that holds the physical resource.
properties.title: Sublocation

properties.description: Shelving information to assist in locating the physical resource.
properties.title: Shelving Location

properties.description:
The rights statement for accessing the resource.
Prefer linking to RightsStatements.org's standardized statements for cultural heritage objects.
properties.title: Rights

properties.description: Contact information for the owning repository, including an email address.
properties.title: Contact Information

properties.description: A formatted bibliographic citation for the resource or the whole collection.
properties.title: Preferred Citation

properties.description: Item number, object file name, accession number, or other identifier associated with the physical item.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description:
The type of identifier.
Suggested values include, but are not limited to, those specified in Standard Identifier Source Codes.
Use "local" for local item identifier.
properties.title: Type

properties.description: Suggested field labels include "Item Number", "Object File Name", "Accession Number".
properties.title: DisplayLabel

properties.description: Information about the metadata record.
properties.title: Record Info

properties.description: The date on which the original MODS record was first created, in format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Creation Date

properties.description: The date on which the MODS record was last modified, in format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Change Date

properties.description: The origin or provenance of the MODS record.
properties.title: Record Origin
